short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Maximize efficiency and connect directly with decision-makers using our cutting-edge tools

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find email addresses and LinkedIn profiles effortlessly with SalesPort.

The SalesPort Email Finder extension is your ultimate tool for collecting leads and accelerating your sales process. This powerful Chrome extension allows you to discover direct email addresses and personal LinkedIn profiles without ever leaving the prospect’s website.

With the SalesPort Email Finder, you can instantly connect with your prospects, streamline your outreach process, and enhance your lead generation efforts.

✓ Save time by finding email addresses and LinkedIn profiles directly from any website you visit. Whether you’re on a professional network or browsing a company’s site, SalesPort lets you gather contact details with just a click.

✓ Access over 470 million global contacts and get the most accurate and up-to-date email addresses, LinkedIn profiles, and soon, phone numbers. Our extensive database ensures your message reaches the right person every time.

✓ Simplify your workflow with a slim, user-friendly design. The SalesPort extension offers an intuitive, clean interface that makes it easy to navigate and manage your leads.

✓ Engage prospects instantly by connecting with them directly from the extension. You can reach out to contacts immediately, maximizing your outreach efficiency without needing additional tools like LinkedIn Sales Navigator.

SalesPort makes lead generation easier for all professionals:

• Sales managers can enhance prospecting by finding more email addresses and connecting with leads directly from their websites.
• Recruiters can expand their sourcing capabilities by accessing accurate, up-to-date contact information.
• Marketers can easily find and connect with bloggers, journalists, and website owners to drive more effective campaigns.

✓ Integrated with the SalesPort platform: Manage all your contacts in one place, organize your leads, and ensure that every outreach effort is targeted and effective.

✓ Works seamlessly alongside other tools: SalesPort integrates smoothly with your existing workflow and can be used alongside other popular extensions without interference.

Get started with SalesPort today

Join thousands of professionals who are already using SalesPort to supercharge their outreach and grow their business. Download the SalesPort Email Finder extension now and start connecting with the right prospects faster and more efficiently.

The SalesPort team is dedicated to your success. We’re here to support you every step of the way. Have questions or feedback? Reach out via the website chat window or at support@salesport.io.

We look forward to seeing you thrive with SalesPort!
